pullrequest.title: Add tutorial with video demonstration on physics parameters

content.raw:
I made some small tweaks to the grammar in the branch `physics_params_misc`. Feel free to take or discard the changes as you see fit.

I have some other minor suggestions, but I don't want to spam this page with nitpick comments. I'm also hesitant to make more changes in another branch because it is difficult to see the diffs when the text wraps differently.

Would you mind I changed this file to have each sentence on its own line ([example](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/453/logical-cameralogical-camera-tutorial-for/diff))? It will make any diffs with another branch much easier to view. That should make it easier for you to decide which suggestions you'd like to keep or skip.
content.html:
I made some small tweaks to the grammar in the branch physics_params_misc. Feel free to take or discard the changes as you see fit.

I have some other minor suggestions, but I don't want to spam this page with nitpick comments. I'm also hesitant to make more changes in another branch because it is difficult to see the diffs when the text wraps differently.

Would you mind I changed this file to have each sentence on its own line (example)? It will make any diffs with another branch much easier to view. That should make it easier for you to decide which suggestions you'd like to keep or skip.
